name: onboarding-tool
description: Root package for the Onboarding Tool project

scripts.start:backend: concurrently "npm --prefix backend/api-gateway start" "npm --prefix backend/services/user-service start" "npm --prefix backend/services/onboarding-service start" "npm --prefix backend/services/notification-service start" "npm --prefix backend/services/template-service start" "npm --prefix backend/services/integration-service start" "npm --prefix backend/services/analytics-service start"
